nodes.text: Mongo Hingo was an individual with a sluggy, jowly face, who at one time acted as satrap of the planet Akiva's satrapy. During the tenure of Satrap Isstra Dirus—one of Hingo's successors—several months after the Battle of Endor, a gold-framed portrait of Hingo hung in the halls of the Satrap's Palace in Akiva's capital city Myrra. Hingo shared a surname with Kade Hingo, another of Dirus' predecessors whose portrait was also displayed at the palace.
Mongo Hingo was created by author Chuck Wendig for the novel Aftermath, which was released in 2015.
